pullrequest.title: MassMatrix3: helper functions for simple shapes

content.raw:
I separated them to avoid confusion about rotations. The `MassMatrix3` can tell you the rotation of the principal axes, but the inertial pose also can have a rotation. If you use the `MassMatrix3` class, then you know everything is computed at the center of mass.

Also, there are some operations that make sense for the `Inertial` class, but not `MassMatrix3`, such as the addition operator (7e922fa), and I wanted to give some separation
